=== FeistyCitas - FeistyParty (Install fests) ===

The FeistyCitas are in spanish like FeistyParty, we will work in a Install Fest and Party to celebrate the Feisty Fawn Release.

The FeistyCitas will be held at the same time in various cities of our country. and we hope offer to all attendees some gifts and the chance to install in their computers (X,K)Ubuntu.

We will be celebrated from 9:00AM to 9:00PM, give everybody a chance to attend the event.

The FeistyCita will be celebrated together with the FLISOL (Festival Latinoamericano de Instalación de Software Libre - Latinamerican Free Software Install Fest) with support from Local LUGs.
